subclassFeature.name: Magic Gunner
entries: A Magic Gunner is a firearm user that can shoot magical bullets.

entries.subclassFeature: Tools of the Trade|Artificer|EFA|Magic Gunner|Magic Gunner|3

subclassFeature.name: Magic Gunner Spells
entries: When you reach an Artificer level specified in the Magic Gunner Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

entries.caption: Magic Gunner Spells
rows: {@spell Yolande's Regal Presence|xphb}, {@spell Jallarzi's Storm of Radiance|xphb}

subclassFeature.name: Concealed Shot
entries: A Ranged weapon you touch is made supernaturally subtle. For 1 minute, when you make a ranged attack using the weapon, the weapon or ammunition you're using becomes invisible while in flight and the weapon becomes silent. If the weapon produces smoke or light, the spell suppresses these effects. The weapon or projectile you're using becomes visible again after the attack hits or misses. If you are hidden and the target is 80 feet or further from you, the attack doesn't reveal your location.

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries:
You gain the following benefits.

Ranged Weaponry. You gain proficiency with Martial Ranged weapons.

Tool Proficiency. You gain proficiency with Woodcarver's Tools. If you already have this proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of Artisan's Tools of your choice.

Wand Crafting. When you craft a magic Wand, the amount of time required to craft it is halved.

subclassFeature.name: Standoff
entries: When you take damage from a creature within 30 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to shoot that creature with your primary weapon.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice instead of once whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Infused Projectiles
entries: You can scribe magic of different elements on bullets. This takes 1 hour and 10 gp for a single bullet. The raw materials are the same required for scrolls.
You can only choose 2 type of projectiles, and gain the knowledge to scribe two more at 9th and 15th level. The infused bullets are +1 at level 9 and +2 at level 15.

entries.caption: Infused Bullet Effect and Cost
rows: +1d4 Cold damage. On a hit, target {@variantrule speed|xphb} is reduced by 15 feet until the start of your next turn.
+1d6 Lightning damage. On a hit, the target and creatures within 5 feet from it can't make {@action Opportunity Attack|xphb|Opportunity Attacks} until the start of its next turn.

+1d4 Necrotic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition Frightened} condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the condtion on a success.
+1d6 Radiant damage. On a hit, until the end of your next turn, the target emits {@variantrule Dim Light|xphb} in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the {@condition Invisible} condition.
+1d8 Thunder damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 10-feet away from you.

subclassFeature.name: Projectile Crafting
entries: You are able to produce bullets yourself, time and costs are described by the table.

entries.caption: Bullets Effect and Cost
rows: On a hit, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition Poisoned} condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the condtion on a success.

+1d10 Piercing damage. {@variantrule Resistance|xphb} to Piercing damage is ignored. {@variantrule Immunity|xphb} of the target to Piercing damage becomes Resistance. This bullet cannot be infused with magic.

Each creature in a 5-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [area of effect]|xphb|Sphere} centered on the target makes a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. If magic is infused on it, roll a {@dice 1d4}, on a 1 the bullet explodes and the infuser takes 9 Fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Deadeye
entries: This feature requires an Action and half of your movement speed. You prepare a multiple guaranteed shot on any creature of your choice that you can see, up to 8. On your next turn, you can take the {@action Attack|xphb} Action, you can discharge the magazines on the creatures selected still in sight. Shots made by this ability don't require Attack Rolls and you can't shoot the same creature two times.
Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|xphb}.

subclassFeature.name: Magical Firearm
entries: You can feel the mechanical mind of your firearms, making you able to attune to them. Attunment to a firearm gives you the ability to {@itemProperty rld|xdmg|Reload} without spending an Action. Bullets of your choice instantly teleport inside your weapon. The bullets must be on your inventory.
